name: Trelstar

indications.text: trelstar indicated treatment advanced prostate cancer [ ( 14 ) ] .

contraindications.text: trelstar administered single intramuscular injection either buttock . due different release characteristics , strengths additive must selected based upon desired dosing schedule . ( 2.1 ) 3.75 mg every 4 weeks . ( 2.1 ) 11.25 mg every 12 weeks . ( 2.1 ) 22.5 mg every 24 weeks . ( 2.1 )

warningsAndPrecautions: trelstar ( triptorelin pamoate injectable suspension ) supplied single dose vial flip-off cap containing sterile lyophilized triptorelin pamoate microgranules incorporated biodegradable copolymer lactic glycolic acids , injection kit consisting vial adapter , 21 gauge 1 ½ ” injection needle , pre-filled syringe containing sterile water injection , usp , 2 ml . trelstar 3.75 mg – ndc 74676-5902-1 : 3.75 mg slightly yellow microgranules provided vial violet flip-off cap injection kit . trelstar 11.25 mg – ndc 74676-5904-1 : 11.25 mg slightly yellow microgranules provided vial yellow green flip-off cap injection kit . trelstar 22.5 mg – ndc 74676-5906-1 : 22.5 mg slightly yellow microgranules provided vial dark green flip-off cap injection kit . storage store 20-25°c ( 68-77°f ) . [ usp controlled room temperature . ] freeze trelstar .
adverseReactions: known hypersensitivity triptorelin component product , gnrh agonists gnrh . ( 4 )
contraindications_original: TRELSTAR is administered as a single intramuscular injection in either buttock.  Due to different release characteristics, the dosage strengths are not additive and must be selected based upon the desired dosing schedule. ( 2.1 ) 3.75 mg every 4 weeks.  ( 2.1 ) 11.25 mg every 12 weeks.  ( 2.1 ) 22.5 mg every 24 weeks.  ( 2.1 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
TRELSTAR (triptorelin pamoate for injectable suspension) is supplied as a single dose vial with a Flip-Off cap containing sterile lyophilized triptorelin pamoate microgranules incorporated in a biodegradable copolymer of lactic and glycolic acids, with injection kit consisting of a vial adapter, a 21 gauge 1 ½” injection needle, and a pre-filled syringe containing sterile water for injection, USP, 2 mL.
                  
                     TRELSTAR 3.75 mg – NDC 74676-5902-1: 3.75 mg of slightly yellow microgranules provided in a vial with a violet flip-off cap with injection kit.
                  
                     TRELSTAR 11.25 mg – NDC 74676-5904-1: 11.25 mg of slightly yellow microgranules provided in a vial with a yellow green flip-off cap with injection kit.
                  
                     TRELSTAR 22.5 mg – NDC 74676-5906-1: 22.5 mg of slightly yellow microgranules provided in a vial with a dark green flip-off cap with injection kit.
                  
                     
                  
                  
                     Storage
                  
                  Store at 20-25°C (68-77°F).  [See USP Controlled Room Temperature.]  Do not freeze TRELSTAR.
adverseReactions_original: Known hypersensitivity to triptorelin or any other component of the product, or other GnRH agonists or GnRH.  ( 4 )
